name: Noor
greetingDialogue: Hey, do you think you can give me a different haircut?
positiveReaction: Wow, nice. I feel so free like this.

dialogues.text: I don't know if you're up to this, but could you give me something that isn't the prescribed style? Anything, I don't care.
Why? Because I need to feel like me and not like everyone else. The Party took away so much of our freedom.

responses.text: Didn't we all agree to this?

dialogues.text: Thank god. I wish the Party would just stop interfering with people's hair like this, it's insane!

responses.text: I like to cut hair my way.
Do you have something against the Party?

dialogues.text: We didn't! I wasn't born yet. So now I just have to live as I'm told? I tell you, a part of human freedom died when the Party took over.
Sure. Fifty years ago maybe. I get that discrimination was bad then, but haircuts? Come on.
Right? It must be awful to be a hairdresser. I wouldn't want to be one. I need to be able to express myself.
Maybe. They have done good stuff for the climate and all, but they take it too far. I want to see the Party go.
